forum.content:
Birds
In the sky
在天空中的鳥兒

Carry
These words for me
請帶上我的話語

Life
Tasted sweet
讓我的人生感到溫暖（甜美）

It let me live
它讓我感受到活著

Let me breathe
讓我感受到呼吸




Love
愛情

Hurt so bad
傷的我如此深

But still...
Saved my soul
但仍拯救了我的靈魂




Flowers
Of a brighter past
They bloomed so free
Beneath the sun
花朵
在過去輝煌中的太陽下
自在的盛開




Memories
記憶

I want to give them to you
我想將它奉獻給你

So you can see
然後你就能夠知道

What we left there
我們留下了什麼

When all hope bleeds out
當希望消失的時候

What remains is doubt
只剩下徬徨不安

Should have left it all for you
要將一切留給你

For tomorrow...
以及明天




As the time draws near
當時刻逐漸消逝

Will you live in fear?
你是否會恐懼呢?

Could have left it all for you
可以將一切留給你

But we let go
但是我們讓它逝去

Fanmade music video of the fantastic song "Quiet's Theme".
I fell in love with Stefanie Joosten afte
urls.title: Quiet's Theme - MGS5 - Stefanie Joosten LIVE (With Lyrics)
